scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && parallelshell "npm run deploy:lcu-el-sign-in" "npm run deploy:lcu-el-register" "npm run deploy:lcu-el-recover-password" "npm run deploy:lcu-sln-identity"
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && ng build common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-recover-password: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-recover-password && ng build lcu-el-recover-password && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-recover-password --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-register: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-register && ng build lcu-el-register && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-register --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-sign-in: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-sign-in && ng build lcu-el-sign-in && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-sign-in --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-sln-identity: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-sln-identity && ng build lcu-sln-identity && npm publish ./dist/lcu-sln-identity --access public
